desc.en: This little jewel of a house has unlimited potential to make a great vacation home for Central Florida getaways (your own or rental to others) or a cozy multi-generational permanent residence. The unique floor plan offers a five-bedroom/four-bathroom main house along with a separate one-bedroom/one-bathroom in-law apartment all centered around a lovely private courtyard pool with lush Florida landscaping. With two of the main house bedrooms and bathrooms being located on the ground floor along with a bright open living/dining area and well-equipped galley kitchen, the home provides a comfortable and inclusive space for all ages and abilities to gather and relax. Outdoors, the central courtyard pool and spa is the focal point for enjoying sunny days and balmy Florida evenings but the spacious covered patio and second floor balcony provide shady dining and seating respites for those great conversations or a quiet escape with a good book! The young ones and the furry friends will love the neighborhood park that sits just behind the home with an exciting play area and fun dog park - truly something for everybody. The property has been well cared for, nicely updated, is offered partially furnished and has many upgrades including specialty ceilings, built-in shelving, solid wood doors and cabinets, crown molding, ceramic tile and quality wood laminate flooring (no carpet except on the stairs), glass shower doors, electronic thermostats and updated ceiling fans. Reunion Resort is a 2,300-acre golf and tennis community, just 6 miles to Disney and the parks, and a short drive to the Orlando International Airport. The home comes with an Active Reunion Resort Membership to provide the option of full access to all of the Resort's amenities including 3 private golf courses, 10 swimming pools, a 5-acre on site water park, tennis and pickleball complex, mini-golf, on-resort shuttle and multiple on site restaurants and lounges. Call us today for your personal tour of this lovely resort property.

property.PropertyName: 1360 Centre Court Ridge Drive #201, Reunion, FL 34747 (MLS # O6197477)

desc.en: Rare to market elegantly appointed second-floor corner condominium in one of the most sought-after buildings in Reunion Resort's popular Centre Court Ridge neighborhood. This property embodies the golden rule of real estate: location, location, location. First, you will enjoy stadium-like views of the 12th hole of the Tom Watson signature golf course from the property's south-facing balcony as well as breathtaking sunset views of the surrounding course and conservation -as you are so close you will feel like you are playing along. Second, as you step out of your condominium you will be right across from the resort pool with hot tub, the award-winning tennis and pickleball complex and the resort's miniature golf course. Third, you will be positioned at the heart of the resort just a short distance to the clubhouse, Starbucks and most of the resort's bars and restaurants including the Sushi Bar, The Chophouse and the 11th-floor tapas-style restaurant and cocktail bar where nightly views of the Disney fireworks are part of the scenery. In a successful vacation rental program with future bookings that can convey, the property comes fully furnished and completely turnkey, ready for immediate enjoyment for long- or short-term rental or for use as a private vacation home. The Centre Court condominiums provide many upgraded features such as granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, crown molding and tray ceilings all as standard and the split floor plan with attached baths to each bedroom allows maximum privacy for all guests. The condominium comes with an active Reunion Resort membership to provide the option of full access to all the resort's amenities including 10 swimming pools, on-site water park and resort shuttle. Reunion Resort is a 2,300-acre golf and tennis community, just 6 miles to Disney and the parks, and a short drive to Orlando International Airport. Call us today for your personal tour of this lovely resort property.

desc.en: ***Active Reunion Club Membership*** Gated community, resort style home currently managed, maintained and marketed for vacation rentals as "The Perfect Getaway". A rear facing, upper-level master opens to a private covered patio with French doors and full view of the pool and tree lined back yard with an additional grassy area for play or pets. There Are 3 Additional Master Bedrooms Each With Their Own Ensuite, The Final Bedroom Has Its Own Walk Out Balcony That Overlooks The Beautiful Golf Course And Spectacular Sunrises. Experience The Resort Lifestyle And Enjoy The Gated Community Of Reunion Resort, Just Minutes Away From Walt Disney Parks And The Other Major Orlando Attractions, Some Of The Best Beaches In The World, And Orlando International Airport. The Resort Has 12 Community Pools, 3 Signature Golf Courses (Palmer, Watson, Nicklaus), Multimillion Dollar Water Park, Several Onsite Restaurants, 2 Golf Pro Shops, Six Hydro-Grid Clay Tennis Courts, A Full-Service Spa, And A New Miniature Golf Course.

desc.en: **Active Reunion Club Membership** Welcome to the renowned guard gated community of Reunion Resort! Positioned with arguably one of the best views in Reunion, featuring expansive views across 9 holes of golf between two of Reunion's three championship golf courses, sits this beautiful, completely upgraded 6 bed, 6 bath home. This is a great opportunity to own a successful vacation rental home in Reunion Resort with a proven rental history. This home has all the key items to be a top-performing vacation rental. This home is sold fully furnished with a transferrable resort membership. When staying with your own family, create memories that will last a lifetime, then, when you're not using the home, enjoy rental revenue to cover expenses. From January 2022 to May 2024, the home has done $372,987 in gross rentals. As you enter the home and make your way to the kitchen, you will immediately notice this home has been completely upgraded! Luxury Quartz countertops have been added to the kitchen, all high-end stainless steel appliances have also been added, new paint, modern decor and luxury furnishings. Laminate wood flooring has been added throughout the entire main level of this home. On the second floor you will find three bedrooms, the primary bedroom is extra large, featuring a four-poster king bed, 70-inch smart tv, large closet, and en-suite bathroom with his and her sinks, this room also has balcony access with spectacular golf views, seating for 4, and a foosball table. Across from the primary bedroom, you will find two large custom theme bedrooms, which are guarenteed to make your little ones dreams come true! One, is a space-themed room, with a full over full purpose-built bunk bed, and a second set of bunk beds as twin over twin. With play cubes, smart tv, and a PS4. The second custom theme room features a Cinderella themed castle bunk bed, and decor thats sure to bring a smile to your princesses face! The home has a very private courtyard so you can relax as the family splashes the afternoon away in your own pool. Lay out on one of your 6 sun loungers and catch some Florida sun, or have a fun-filled afternoon with the family playing the poolside games provided. The home has a pool fence with a self-closing door as well as a kid's corner play area. The home offers a Sonos sound system inside and out to create the vacation feeling no matter where you are in the house. Making your way to the detached annex, on the first floor you will find an amazing arcade room. This room features a 2-4 player PAC-MAN Smash Redemption arcade, 52 pucks air hockey game, Super Bikes 2, Dual Twisted Racer, a Basketball Arcade, Deadstorm Pirates arcade, and a multi-arcade game. As you head upstairs you will find a quaint kitchen, perfect for the group staying here to enjoy a snack or morning coffee in private. There is a king bed in one bedroom and Queen beds in the second bedroom, each bedroom having its own SMART TVs and access to an adjoining bathroom. Reunion Resort is positioned with quick access to all the major theme parks, especially Disney World, being Just 2 Exits Away, making Reunion Resort top choice for visitors of all ages. Reunion features 3 championship golf courses within its gates, 12 Pools, Including a 4 acre water park, Complete with a lazy river, splash park for the little ones, tiki bar, & Water Slides, 5 restaurants, tennis/pickleball courts, putt putt golf, and many more amenities, making Reunion truly a city within gates.

Welcome to this fully furnished POOL home located in the exclusive community of Reunion Resort just minutes away from Disney World. Home sits in a gated community and features 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. The first level host a primary suite with a full bath, laundry closet, an open floor plan combining the living/dining room. Kitchen features 42" cabinets, stainless steel appliances, pantry and breakfast bar. A stunning fenced patio with a POOL surrounded by large concrete deck areas. In addition, there is a detached 1 car garage and guest parking pad on the back. Second level host another primary suite, two more bedrooms with a Jack and Jill bathroom and a balcony with a beautiful waterfront view. The Reunion Community is strategically located near amusement parks, shopping, restaurants and provides residents with multiple amenities including Pools, Fitness Center, playgrounds, walking trails with scenic views, dog park and Pavilions. Your dream awaits! Submit your offer today.

The kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring sleek granite countertops, a 4-burner gas range, modern stainless-steel appliances, and ample cabinet space for all your culinary needs. The master suite is a sanctuary of relaxation, with a unique in-room soaking tub and sliding glass doors that frame enchanting views. Reunion Resort is not just a location; it's a lifestyle. Minutes from Walt Disney Parks and Orlando's other major attractions, this gated community offers unparalleled access to the best of Florida. With 12 community pools, 3 signature golf courses (Palmer, Watson, and Nicklaus), a multimillion-dollar water park, multiple on-site dining options, two golf pro shops, six hydro-grid clay tennis courts, a full-service spa, and a brand-new miniature golf course, Reunion Resort redefines luxury living. Embrace the opportunity to live the resort lifestyle you've always dreamed of, all within the luxurious confines of Reunion Resort. Don't miss your chance to make 7502 Seven Eagles Way your new home.

desc.en: The perfect Florida pied-Ã -terre. Extremely private executive residence with golf frontage on the first tee of the Jack Nicklaus signature course at Reunion Resort. This delightfully unique home has been carefully designed to blend the natural exterior aspects of its Florida locale with the artfully curated globally-sourced interior finishes in order to meld the two, bringing the outdoors in and letting the indoors flow seamlessly outward. Ground floor living is focused around a spacious central outdoor Ipe wood patio and lap pool with elements of earth, fire and water. The patio is covered with a UVA/UVB glass roof, has drop-down screens for year-round enjoyment and opens to a South-facing private garden with gazebo and stone walkway over streaming water with fragrant flowers and plants. Stepping inside, the six-foot custom Pella circular window allows the garden view to follow you across the Italian porcelain flooring of the first level past the accessible downstairs bedroom/TV room to the thoughtfully designed kitchen and dining/living area where the circular theme continues. Here custom Busby pink beech rounded edge cabinetry and Zimbabwe black granite countertops masterfully incorporate both gas and electric Gaggenau cooktops and steamer, along with Miele, GE Monogram and Bosch appliances. All are accented by Namibian marble and glass tile backsplashes, abundant custom round electrical outlets, Murano glass pendant lighting and natural light from both the South-facing windows of the kitchen and the sliding golf-facing patio doors of the living room. The Busby pink beech cabinetry and millwork continue throughout the home on both levels to provide quality and symmetry of the highest standard. Curved open-tread stairs leading to the second level are hand-crafted from Iroko wood with a custom rounded glass banister to assure the continuity of rounded lines as well as the reflection of the natural light. The second level provides a private master wing with built-in Busby wardrobes, cabinets and headboard and a spa-like bathroom with Italian leather-look porcelain tile flooring, custom marble dust vanity, shower and soaking tub all opening to a private second floor balcony overlooking the first tee and with panoramic views down the fairway. Also on the second level is a second bedroom and bath and an interior walkway that leads to an extremely spacious and open office with built in Busby pink beech desks, file drawers and library shelving and its own kitchenette - perfect for keeping up with the office or business while spending the Winter in Florida. The office expands into an upstairs recreation room with Busby entertainment center and Murphy bed and full bathroom. Located in a club setting with access via the transferable active membership to 3 signature golf courses, tennis, spa, multiple pools and on-site restaurants. Nestled within this secure, guard-gated community lies a fully furnished 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom first-floor condo unit, beckoning you to indulge in the ultimate resort lifestyle. Step inside and be greeted by an ambiance of sophistication and comfort. The spacious foyer sets the stage for what awaits - an open floor plan bathed in natural light, complemented by tasteful neutral tones and elegant crown molding. French doors invite you to explore further, seamlessly blending indoor and outdoor living. The kitchen is a culinary haven, boasting granite countertops, finely crafted wood cabinets, and top-of-the-line appliances. Gather around the breakfast bar, where conversations flow effortlessly amidst the culinary delights. Retreat to the primary suite, where luxury knows no bounds. French doors lead to your private patio, offering serene views to start and end your day. The en-suite bathroom is a sanctuary of relaxation, featuring a granite-topped vanity, soaking tub, and a rejuvenating shower stall. Two additional guest bedrooms ensure ample space for family and friends, while a full bathroom ensures comfort for all. Outside, two covered patios beckon you to bask in the beauty of the lush golf course surroundings. Reunion Resort & Golf Club is more than a community - it's a multi-generational haven offering endless amenities. From signature golf courses designed by legends like Tom Watson, Jack Nicklaus, and Arnold Palmer to pools, tennis courts, and dining options, every moment promises leisure and pleasure. Venture beyond the resort's borders and discover a world of excitement at your doorstep. With easy access to I-4, iconic attractions like Disney, Universal, and Seaworld are just moments away. Live, work, and play amidst the magic of Central Florida. Your dream resort lifestyle awaits - seize the opportunity today. Schedule your private showing and make this vision your reality.

Dreaming of owning a Florida vacation home, complete with jaw dropping themed rooms and state of the art arcade? Look no further! Dubbed the Wonderland Castle, now is your chance to own one of the best homes in Reunion!. This golf-front, French Chateau has been updated with fresh interior paint, 3 brand new HVAC units, updated bedrooms and is being offered fully furnished with future rental bookings for excellent income while you're away ($103K in 2022). Custom built, you'll find only high-end finishes including: handscraped wide-plank hardwood floors, travertine tile, soaring ceiling heights, stunning hand-carved millwork, crown molding, stacked stone features and more. Offering 6 bedrooms and 7 total bathrooms, there is an abundance of space, glamour, functionality and fun for all ages! Awaken the Princess or the Wizard within in the captivating theme rooms, or soak up the Florida sun in the sparkling pool. The outdoor entertainment area features lush landscaping in a park-like setting for privacy adorned with golf views, along with summer kitchen, plenty of lounge space and a heated spa for the ultimate R&R. This property also comes with a transferable golf membership. Reunion is the area's premier resort community offering 3 golf courses, waterpark, numerous restaurants, mini golf, spa, and so much more, situated just a short drive to Disney and area attractions with easy highway access. Make your appointment to view today!

desc.en: EASY SHOW! REUNION MEMBERSHIP AVAILABLE WITH THIS PROPERTY! This home offers majestic views from just behind the green on the no.2 hole of The Nicklaus at Reunion. Whether Primary, vacation, or investment property this one offers it all. Reunion Resort is located just 6 miles from Walt Disney World and theme parks. The Resort offers incredible amenities from 3 World Class Championship GOLF COURSES designed by Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson and Jack Nicklaus as well as 12 pools in the community including MULTIMILLION DOLLAR WATER PARK with lazy river and water slide.

property.PropertyName: 784 Desert Mountain Court, Reunion, FL 34747 (MLS # O6072598)

desc.en: Reunion Resort featuring this 13 bed 12.5 bathroom masterpiece with over 6300 sq ft. This home has been professionally designed and decorated with a Minions bedroom, an Avengers bedroom, and a Star Wars themed theater room! Walk inside to the open concept great room, dining room, and kitchen with views of the massive patio and pool area. The patio is unbelievable with it's golf course views and full sun for swimming and lounging. Cook up a great dinner on the built-in bbq and then enjoy some smores for desert around the firepit and night. Back inside the home the amazing kitchen features granite countertops, a huge island, and double appliances. There's also an air conditioned fitness room, 2 laundry rooms, an upstairs bonus loft with a rear balcony, a wet bar, and 3 full size arcade games! This home makes for an incredible family getaway and vacation rental investment. Totally turn-key and immaculate inside and out. The owner is also the listing agent and a licensed real estate agent in Florida.

Located just steps from Reunions 5 acre waterpark this condo is in a great location and offers a wonderful opportunity to own a revenue generating vacation home or with 3 bed and 3 full baths a spacious and comfortable primary residence. Reunion Resort is located just 6 miles from Walt Disney World and theme parks. The Resort offers incredible amenities from 3 World Class Championship GOLF COURSES designed by Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson and Jack Nicklaus as well as 12 pools in the community including MULTIMILLION DOLLAR WATER PARK with lazy river & water slide.

Stunning Reunion 5 bed, 4.5 bath pool home! Perfect for investors as a very successful short term rental property and also perfect as a primary residence. As you enter, you will notice the spacious open floor plan flows effortlessly throughout the home leading you to your own backyard oasis. Not only are there no rear neighbors, you also have an incredible view of the legendary Jack Nicklaus Tradition golf course. The oversized gourmet kitchen boasts gorgeous hardwood cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances. The living room, located right off the kitchen, is bright and airy and includes French doors that lead to the pool deck. This home offers a large first floor master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom complete with a garden tub & walk-in shower. There is also 1 guest bedroom with an ensuite bathroom on the first floor. On the second floor there is a spacious loft area perfect for a game or lounge room along with the 3 additional guest bedrooms & 2 other full bathrooms. Reunion is a one of a kind resort and golf community that has many amenities including a water park complete with water slides, lazy river, zero entry pools & food and beverage service, 3 award-winning golf courses (Palmer, Watson & Nicklaus), 11 pools throughout the community, mini-golf, tennis courses, pickleball courts, playgrounds, golf cart & bike rentals and on-site restaurants. *HOME HAS ACTIVE MEMBERSHIP*
